definition: To gain knowledge or information through personal experience or by being informed, often used to describe acquiring expertise or skills in a specific field. It is commonly used to refer to the process of learning or becoming knowledgeable about something through practical involvement or firsthand encounters.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern erfahren, dass ich den Job bekommen habe.
examples.english: I found out yesterday that I got the job.

examples.german: Er hat viel über die Geschichte des Landes erfahren.
examples.english: He learned a lot about the history of the country.

examples.german: Sie möchte gerne mehr über das Thema erfahren.
examples.english: She would like to learn more about the topic.

examples.german: Ich habe von dem Unfall durch einen Freund erfahren.
examples.english: I heard about the accident from a friend.

examples.german: Wir haben viel über die Kultur des Landes erfahren.
examples.english: We learned a lot about the culture of the country.
